resources.string:
33. HSPM Solutions has high regard for intellectual property and expects the same level of standard to be employed by its users. HSPM Solutions may, in appropriate circumstances and at its discretion, terminate the Account or prohibit access to the Website/Mobile App of users who infringe upon the intellectual property rights of others. If you believe that your work has been copied and posted on the Website/Mobile App in a way that constitutes copyright infringement and/or trademark infringement, please send the following information to us at [support@hspmsolutions.com]:

 a) identification of the copyrighted and/or trademarked work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at that site; 
 b) identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled at the Website/Mobile App, and information reasonably sufficient to permit HSPM Solutions to locate the material.; 
 c) a written statement that you have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright and/or trademark owner, its agent, or the law; 
d) information reasonably sufficient to permit HSPM Solutions to contact you as the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which you may be contacted; 
 e) an electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive interest that is allegedly infringed; and 
 f) a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the information in your report is accurate and that you are the owner of the exclusive right or authorized to act on the behalf of the owner of the exclusive right. A statement by you comprised of the foregoing points is referred to herein as the "Notice." Only the intellectual property rights owner is permitted to report potentially infringing items through HSPM Solutions's reporting system set forth above. If you are not the intellectual property rights owner, you should contact the intellectual property rights owner and they can choose whether to use the procedures set forth in these Terms of Use. 

 34. HSPM Solutions reserves the right at any time and from time to time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Website/Mobile App (or any part thereof) with or without notice and in its sole discretion. You agree that HSPM Solutions shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of Services. 

 35. Termination by HSPM Solutions: You hereby acknowledge and agree that HSPM Solutions, in its sole and absolute discretion, has the right (but not the obligation) to delete, terminate, or deactivate your Account, block your email or IP address, cancel the Website/Mobile App or otherwise terminate your access to or participation in the use of the Website/Mobile App (or any part thereof), or remove and discard any Submitted Content on the Website/Mobile App ("Termination of Service"), immediately and without notice, for any reason, including without limitation, Account inactivity or if HSPM Solutions believes or has reason to believe that you have violated any provision of these Terms of Use. 

 36. Termination by You: You may cancel your use of the Website/Mobile App and/or terminate these Terms of Use with or without cause at any time by following the link in your Account under "Account Preferences" to "Deactivate Account". 

 37. Effect of Termination: Upon termination of your Account, your right to participate in the Website/Mobile App, including, but not limited to, your right to offer or purchase Services and your right to receive any fees or compensation, including, without limitation, referral discounts, incentive bonuses, or other special offer rewards, shall automatically terminate. You acknowledge and agree that your right to receive any fees or compensation hereunder is conditional upon your proper use of the Website/Mobile App, your adherence to these Terms of Use, the continuous activation of your Account, and your permitted participation in the Website/Mobile App. In the event of Termination of Service, your Account will be disabled and you may not be granted access to your Account or any files or other data contained in your Account. Notwithstanding the foregoing, residual data may remain in the HSPM Solutions system. Unless HSPM Solutions has previously cancelled or terminated your use of the Website/Mobile App (in which case subsequent notice by HSPM Solutions shall not be required), if you provided a valid email address during registration, HSPM Solutions will notify you via email of any such termination or cancellation, which shall be effective immediately upon HSPM Solutions's delivery of such notice. Upon Termination of Service, the following shall occur: all licenses granted to you hereunder will immediately terminate; and you shall promptly destroy all copies of HSPM Solutions Data (as defined below), Marks (as defined below) and other content in your possession or control. You further acknowledge and agree that HSPM Solutions shall not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of your access to the Website/Mobile App. Upon Termination of Service, HSPM Solutions retains the right to use any data collected from your use of the Website/Mobile App for internal analysis and archival purposes, and all related licenses you have granted HSPM Solutions hereunder shall remain in effect for the foregoing purpose. In no event is HSPM Solutions obligated to return any Submitted Content to you. Paras from 34 to 54 and 56 to 70 shall survive expiration or termination of the Website/Mobile App or your Account. You agree to indemnify and hold HSPM Solutions, and its officers, managers, members, affiliates, successor, assigns, directors, agents, service professionals, suppliers, and employees harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees and court costs, made by any third party due to or arising out of the Termination of Service. 

 38. The content on the Website/Mobile App (exclusive of all Submitted Content), including without limitation, the text, software, scripts, graphics, photos, sounds, music, videos, interactive features and the like ("Data") and the trademarks, service marks and logos contained therein ("Marks"), are owned by HSPM Solutions. Other trademarks, names and logos on this Website/Mobile App are the property of their respective owners. Data on the Website/Mobile App is provided to you AS IS for your information and personal use only and may not be used, copied, reproduced, distributed, transmitted, broadcast, displayed, sold, licensed, or otherwise exploited for any other purposes whatsoever without the prior written consent of the respective owners. HSPM Solutions reserves all rights not expressly granted in and to the Website/Mobile App and the Data. You agree not to use, copy, or distribute, any of the Data other than as expressly permitted herein, including any use, copying, or distribution of Submitted Content obtained through the Website/Mobile App for any commercial purposes. If you download or print a copy of the Data for personal use, you must retain all copyright and other proprietary notices contained thereon. You agree not to circumvent, disable or otherwise interfere with security features of the Website/Mobile App or features that prevent or restrict use or copying of any Data or enforce limitations on use of the Website/Mobile App or the Data therein. 

 39. The Website/Mobile App contains HSPM Solutions's Data and Marks, which are, or may become, protected by copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret and other laws, and HSPM Solutions owns and retains all rights in the HSPM Solutions Data and Marks. Subject to these Terms of Use, HSPM Solutions hereby grants you a limited, revocable, non-transferable, non-sublicensable license to reproduce and display the HSPM Solutions Data (excluding any software source code) solely for your personal use in connection with accessing and participating in the Website/Mobile App. The Website/Mobile App may also contain Data of other users or licensors, which you shall not copy, modify, translate, publish, broadcast, transmit, distribute, perform, display, or sell. 

 40. Joining HSPM Solutions, opening an Account, posting Services and viewing posted Services is free. HSPM Solutions reserves the right at its sole discretion to charge fees to Service Professionals for other services that HSPM Solutions may provide in the future. HSPM Solutions may also in certain categories require Service Professionals to make payments for following up on job leads i.e. requests posted by Service Users and permitting the Service Professional to contact the Service User (“Lead Fee”) irrespective of whether the job leads eventually result in a transaction or exchange of consideration for the service requested. In order to be eligible to make such Lead Fee payment, Service Professionals shall be required to make advance payments (“Credits”) from which the Lead Fee may be deducted as and when necessary. Whenever the Credits fall below the prescribed threshold, the Service Professional shall be prompted to refill the Credits in order to continue enjoying the ability to follow up on leads and contacting Service Users. The service professional is entitled to refund of credits that is credited back in their wallet in the following conditions:

 a) Refunds are processed when customer cancels request; 
 b) Refunds are processed if the customer has not viewed quote and not cancelled request 4 days after your response.


 41. In the event, (i) the job lead is identified to be non-genuine, or (ii) the Service User within 48 hours of posting a request on the Website/Mobile App withdraws the same by way of the Website/Mobile App, or (iii) the Service Professional pays the Lead Fee to respond to the Service User’s request for Service, but the Service User does not open or access the Service Professional’s response, the Lead Fee shall be reimbursed to the Service Professional. The decision of HSPM Solutions pertaining to the above shall be final and binding.


 42. HSPM Solutions offers premium services to Service Professionals for a fee and may in the future offer additional services, like tax preparation and bookkeeping that Service Professionals can also choose to purchase. HSPM Solutions reserves the right to charge fees for these services at its sole discretion.


43. Joining HSPM Solutions, opening an Account, viewing posted Services, and bidding on posted Services is free. HSPM Solutions currently does not charge Service Users for transactions completed on the Website/Mobile App between Service Users and Services Professionals. However, HSPM Solutions reserves the right to charge a fee to Service Users in the future on a per-transaction basis or in any other manner, and reserves the right to do so in its sole discretion. Changes to this Fee Policy are effective after HSPM Solutions has provided you with thirty (30) days' notice by posting the changes on the Website/Mobile App. If applicable, you agree to pay all fees or charges to your Account based on HSPM Solutions's fees, charges, and billing terms then in effect. If you do not pay on time or if HSPM Solutions cannot charge your credit card, any payment gateway or other payment method for any reason, HSPM Solutions reserves the right to either suspend or terminate your access to the Website/Mobile App and Account and terminate these Terms of Use. You are expressly agreeing that HSPM Solutions is permitted to bill you for the applicable fees, any applicable tax and any other charges you may incur in connection with your use of this Website/Mobile App and the fees will be billed to your credit card, a payment gateway or other payment method designated at the time you make a purchase or register for a fee-based service. If you cancel your Account at any time, you will not receive any refund. If you have a balance due on any account, you agree that HSPM Solutions may charge such unpaid fees to your credit card or otherwise bill you for such unpaid fees. HSPM Solutions reserves its right to initiate appropriate legal proceedings, if necessary, in its sole discretion, to recover such outstanding amounts. 

 44. You understand that we are acting solely as an intermediary for the collection of fees between a Service User and a Service Professional who choose to enter into an agreement for Service. Because state and local tax laws vary significantly by locality, you understand and agree that you are solely responsible for determining your own tax reporting requirements in consultation with tax advisors, and that we cannot and do not offer tax advice to either hosts or guests. Further, you understand that HSPM Solutions shall not be responsible or liable in any manner in relation to tax liability of a Service User or a Service Professional. 

 45. All commissions payable to HSPM Solutions by Service Professionals on consummated transactions, i.e. exchange of services for consideration, are final and non-refundable. All monies paid by Service Professionals in form of “Credits” are non-interest bearing and shall be refunded to the Service Professionals if they remain un-utilised for a period greater than 364 days only. Such amounts shall not be refunded prior to that. 

 46. As a courtesy to Registered Users, to facilitate the negotiation and confirmation of the agreement for Service, HSPM Solutions provides a general framework for negotiating these Terms of Service (e.g., rate) ("Negotiation Worksheet"). Registered Users acknowledge and agree that (i) they are solely responsible for addressing all issues that exist now or may arise in the future in connection with the applicable Service; and (ii) it is solely up to such Registered Users, if they so desire, to enter into a signed, written contract, that addresses all of the relevant issues and memorializes the agreed upon Negotiation Worksheet. 

 47. You should not rely on the any information or resources contained on the Website/Mobile App, including, without limitation, the Negotiation Worksheet, as a replacement or substitute for any professional, financial, legal or other advice or counsel. HSPM Solutions makes no representations and warranties, and expressly disclaims any and all liability, concerning actions taken by a user following the information or using the resources offered or provided on or through the Website/Mobile Apps, including, without limitation, the Negotiation Worksheet. In no way will HSPM Solutions be responsible for any actions taken or not taken based on the information or resources provided on this Website/Mobile App. If you have a situation that requires professional advice, you should consult a qualified specialist. Do not disregard, avoid or delay obtaining professional advice from a qualified specialist because of information or resources that are provided on this Website/Mobile App, however provided. 

 48. Each Registered User hereby acknowledges and agrees that HSPM Solutions is NOT a party to any oral or written agreement for Service, Negotiation Worksheet, or any contract entered into between Registered Users in connection with any Service offered, directly or indirectly, through the Website/Mobile App. Each Registered User acknowledges, agrees and understands that HSPM Solutions only seeks to provide a platform wherein the Service User and Service Professional can be brought together and HSPM Solutions itself has not role in the execution or provision of Services. 

 49. No agency, partnership, joint venture, or employment is created as a result of these Terms of Use or your use of any part of the Website/Mobile App, including without limitation, the Negotiation Worksheet or agreement for Service. You do not have any authority whatsoever to bind HSPM Solutions in any respect. All Service Professionals are independent contractors. Neither HSPM Solutions nor any users of the Website/Mobile App may direct or control the day-to-day activities of the other, or create or assume any obligation on behalf of the other. 

 50. Subject to the provisions regarding disputes between Website/Mobile App participants in connection with Feedback, your interactions with individuals and/or organizations found on or through the Website/Mobile App, including payment of and performance of any Service, and any other terms, conditions, warranties or representations associated with such transactions or dealings, are solely between you and such individual or organization. You should take reasonable precautions and make whatever investigation or inquiries you deem necessary or appropriate before proceeding with any online or offline transaction with any third party, including without limitation, Service Professionals and Service Users. 

 51. You understand that deciding whether to use the Services of a Service Professional or provide Services to a Service User or use information contained in any Submitted Content, including, without limitation, Postings, Offers, Wants and/or Feedback, is your personal decision for which alone are responsible. You understand that HSPM Solutions does not warrant and cannot make representations as to the suitability of any individual you may decide to interact with on or through the Website/Mobile App and/or the accuracy or suitability of any advice, information, or recommendations made by any individual. While HSPM Solutions may attempt to seek information about the background of a Service Professional, either via a telephonic or in-person interview, review of past work/customer feedback and/or check presence online (if available) on Facebook, personalised Website/Mobile App, LinkedIn, Twitter etc., you understand that Service Professionals may register themselves suo moto. You also understand that any so called background check undertaken by HSPM Solutions is not exhaustive to the extent to determine previous criminal antecedents and hence, at the end of the day, the Service User should take an informed decision on his/her own accord and keep in mind the fact that HSPM Solutions only seeks to provide a platform wherein Service Users and Service Professionals have an opportunity to meet each other. 

 52. NOTWITHSTANDING THE FOREGOING, YOU AGREE THAT SINCE HSPM SOLUTIONS only seeks to provide a platform wherein the Service User and Service Professional can be brought together and HSPM Solutions itself has not role in the execution or provision of Services ITSELF, HSPM SOLUTIONS SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE OF ANY SORT WHATSOEVER INCURRED AS THE RESULT OF ANY SUCH TRANSACTION OR DEALINGS. IF THERE IS A DISPUTE BETWEEN PARTICIPANTS ON THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, OR BETWEEN REGISTERED USERS OR ANY WEBSITE/MOBILE APP USER AND ANY THIRD PARTY, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT HSPM SOLUTIONS IS UNDER NO OBLIGATION TO BECOME INVOLVED. IN THE EVENT THAT A DISPUTE ARISES BETWEEN YOU AND ONE OR MORE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP USERS, REGISTERED USERS OR ANY THIRD PARTY, YOU HEREBY RELEASE HSPM SOLUTIONS, ITS OFFICERS, MANAGERS, MEMBERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, ATTORNEYS, AGENTS, AND SUCCESSORS IN RIGHTS FROM ANY CLAIMS, DEMANDS, AND DAMAGES (ACTUAL AND CONSEQUENTIAL) OF EVERY KIND OR NATURE, KNOWN OR UNKNOWN, SUSPECTED OR UNSUSPECTED, FORESEEABLE OR UNFORESEEABLE, DISCLOSED OR UNDISCLOSED, ARISING OUT OF OR IN ANY WAY RELATED TO SUCH DISPUTES AND/OR THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR ANY SERVICE PROVIDED THEREUNDER. 

 53. If a dispute arises between you and HSPM Solutions, our goal is to provide you with a neutral and cost effective means of resolving the dispute quickly. Accordingly, you and HSPM Solutions hereby agree that we will resolve any claim or controversy at law and equity that arises out of these Terms of Use or the Website/Mobile App in accordance with this Para 53 or as we and you otherwise agree in writing. Before resorting to the filing of a formal lawsuit, we strongly encourage you to first contact us directly to seek a resolution via e-mail at [support@hspmsolutions.com]. The dispute shall be resolved through alternative dispute resolution procedures, such as mediation or arbitration, as alternatives to litigation. 

 54. These Terms of Use shall be governed in all respects by the laws of India and any legal proceeding arising out of these Terms of Use will occur exclusively in the courts located in New Delhi, India. 

 55. Aspects of the Website/Mobile App and other HSPM Solutions services may be supported by advertising revenue. As such, HSPM Solutions may display advertisements and promotions on the service. The manner, mode and extent of advertising by HSPM Solutions on the Website/Mobile App are subject to change and the appearance of advertisements on the Website/Mobile App does not necessarily imply endorsement by HSPM Solutions of any advertised products or services. You agree that HSPM Solutions shall not be responsible or liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred by you as a result of any such dealings or as the result of the presence of such advertisers on the Website/Mobile App.

56. The Website/Mobile App may provide, or third parties may provide, links, contact forms and/or phone numbers to other Website/Mobile Apps or resources, including, without limitation, social networking, blogging and similar Website/Mobile Apps through which you are able to log into the Website/Mobile App using your existing account and log-in credentials for such third-party Website/Mobile Apps. Certain areas of the Website/Mobile App may allow you to interact and/or conduct transactions with such third-party sites, and, if applicable, allow you to configure your privacy settings in your third-party site account to permit your activities on the Website/Mobile App to be shared with your contacts in your third-party site account. Because HSPM Solutions has no control over such sites and resources, you acknowledge and agree that HSPM Solutions is not responsible for the availability of such external sites or resources, and is not responsible or liable for any content, advertising, products, goods or services on or available from such Website/Mobile Apps or resources. Unless expressly stated on the Website/Mobile App, links to third-party sites should in no way be considered as or interpreted to be HSPM Solutions's endorsement of such third-party sites or any product or service offered through them. You further acknowledge and agree that HSPM Solutions shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, advertising, product, goods or services available on or through any such Website/Mobile App or resource. The Third-party website/mobile app may have different privacy policies and terms and conditions and business practices than HSPM Solutions. In certain situations, you may be transferred to a Third-party website/mobile app through a link or connected to a Third-party resource by a contact form or phone but it may appear that you are still on this Website/Mobile App or transacting with HSPM Solutions. In these situations, you acknowledge and agree that the Third-party website/mobile app terms and conditions and privacy policy apply in this situation. Your dealings and communications through the Website/Mobile App with any party other than HSPM Solutions are solely between you and such third party. Any complaints, concerns or questions you have relating to materials provided by third parties should be forwarded directly to the applicable third party. 

 57. YOU AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP SHALL BE AT YOUR OWN RISK. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, AND HSPM SOLUTIONS AND ITS OFFICERS, MANAGERS, MEMBERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, SUCCESSORS, ASSIGNS, SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, SERVICE PROFESSIONALS, SUPPLIERS, AND AGENTS DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, AND MAKE NO WARRANTIES, REPRESENTATIONS, OR GUARANTEES IN CONNECTION WITH THIS WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, THE SERVICES OFFERED ON OR THROUGH THIS WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, ANY DATA, MATERIALS, SUBMITTED CONTENT, RELATING TO THE QUALITY, SUITABILITY, TRUTH, ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF ANY INFORMATION OR MATERIAL CONTAINED OR PRESENTED ON THIS WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION THE MATERIALS, DATA AND SUBMITTED CONTENT OF OTHER USERS OF THIS SITE OR OTHER THIRD PARTIES. UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPLICITLY STATED, TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, THIS WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, THE SERVICES OFFERED ON OR THROUGH THIS WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, DATA, MATERIALS, SUBMITTED CONTENT, AND ANY INFORMATION OR MATERIAL CONTAINED OR PRESENTED ON THIS WEBSITE/MOBILE APP IS PROVIDED TO YOU ON AN "AS IS," "AS AVAILABLE" AND "WHEREIS" BASIS WITH NO WARRANTY OF IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD-PARTY RIGHTS. HSPM SOLUTIONS DOES NOT PROVIDE ANY WARRANTIES AGAINST ERRORS, MISTAKES, OR INACCURACIES OF DATA, CONTENT, INFORMATION, MATERIALS, SUBSTANCE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR SUBMITTED CONTENT, ANY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR USE OF OUR SECURE SERVERS AND/OR ANY AND ALL PERSONAL INFORMATION AND/OR FINANCIAL INFORMATION STORED THEREIN, ANY BUGS, VIRUSES, TROJAN HORSES, OR THE LIKE WHICH MAY BE TRANSMITTED TO OR THROUGH THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP BY ANY THIRD PARTY, ANY INTERRUPTION OR CESSATION OF TRANSMISSION TO OR FROM THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, ANY DEFAMATORY, OFFENSIVE, OR ILLEGAL CONDUCT OF ANY THIRD PARTY OR SERVICE USER OR SERVICE PROVIDER, OR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE OF ANY KIND INCURRED AS A RESULT OF THE USE OF ANY DATA, CONTENT, INFORMATION, MATERIALS, SUBSTANCE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR SUBMITTED CONTENT POSTED, EMAILED, TRANSMITTED, OR OTHERWISE MADE AVAILABLE VIA THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP. HSPM SOLUTIONS DOES NOT ENDORSE, WARRANT, GUARANTEE, OR ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY PRODUCT OR SERVICE ADVERTISED OR OFFERED BY A THIRD PARTY THROUGH THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR ANY HYPERLINKED SITE OR FEATURED IN ANY BANNER OR OTHER ADVERTISEMENT. HSPM SOLUTIONS WILL NOT BE A PARTY TO OR IN ANY WAY BE RESPONSIBLE FOR MONITORING ANY TRANSACTION BETWEEN YOU AND ANY PARTY, INCLUDING THIRD PARTY SERVICE PROFESSIONALS OF PRODUCTS OR SERVICES. AS WITH THE USE OF ANY PRODUCT OR SERVICE, AND THE PUBLISHING OR POSTING OF ANY MATERIAL THROUGH ANY MEDIUM OR IN ANY ENVIRONMENT, YOU SHOULD USE YOUR BEST JUDGMENT AND EXERCISE CAUTION WHERE APPROPRIATE. 

 58. IN NO EVENT SHALL HSPM SOLUTIONS, OR ITS RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, MANAGERS, MEMBERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, SUCCESSORS, ASSIGNS, SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, SERVICE PROFESSIONALS, SUPPLIERS, ATTORNEYS OR AGENTS, BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES (INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF BUSINESS, REVENUE, PROFITS, USE, DATA OR OTHER ECONOMIC ADVANTAGE) WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM ANY (I) ACCESS TO OR USE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR ANY SERVICES OFFERED BY ANY SERVICE PROFESSIONALS VIA THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, INCLUDING SERVICES PROVIDED PURSUANT TO AN AGREEMENT FORMED INDEPENDENTLY OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, WHETHER OR NOT AN AGREEMENT FOR SERVICE FORMED VIA THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP IS IN EFFECT; (II) ERRORS, MISTAKES, OR INACCURACIES OF DATA, MARKS, CONTENT, INFORMATION, MATERIALS OR SUBSTANCE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR SUBMITTED CONTENT; (III) ANY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR USE OF OUR SECURE SERVERS AND/OR ANY AND ALL PERSONAL INFORMATION AND/OR FINANCIAL INFORMATION STORED THEREIN; (IV) ANY BUGS, VIRUSES, TROJAN HORSES, OR THE LIKE WHICH MAY BE TRANSMITTED TO OR THROUGH THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP BY ANY THIRD PARTY; (V) ANY INTERRUPTION OR CESSATION OF TRANSMISSION TO OR FROM THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP; (VI) ANY ERRORS OR OMISSIONS IN ANY DATA, CONTENT, INFORMATION, MATERIALS OR SUBSTANCE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR SUBMITTED CONTENT; (VII) ANY FAILED NEGOTIATIONS FOR A SERVICE, ANY DISPUTES THAT ARISE DURING OR AFTER THE NEGOTIATION OF A SERVICE OR THE FORMATION OF A CONTRACT FOR A SERVICE, OR ANY OTHER DISPUTE THAT ARISES BETWEEN USERS OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP; (VIII) ANY DEFAMATORY, OFFENSIVE, OR ILLEGAL CONDUCT OF ANY THIRD PARTY OR SERVICE USER OR SERVICE PROFESSIONAL; OR (IX) ANY USE OF ANY DATA, MARKS, CONTENT, INFORMATION, MATERIALS OR SUBSTANCE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP OR SUBMITTED CONTENT POSTED, EMAILED, TRANSMITTED, OR OTHERWISE MADE AVAILABLE ON OR THROUGH THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, WHETHER BASED ON WARRANTY, CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY, AND WHETHER OR NOT HSPM SOLUTIONS IS ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. THE FOREGOING LIMITATION OF LIABILITY SHALL APPLY TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW IN THE APPLICABLE JURISDICTION. 

 59. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE TOTAL, AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF HSPM SOLUTIONS, OR ANY OF THE ABOVE-REFERENCED RESPECTIVE PARTIES, ARISING FROM OR RELATING TO THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, AND/OR SUBMITTED CONTENT EXCEED THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF FEES ACTUALLY PAID TO HSPM SOLUTIONS BY YOU HEREUNDER. 

 60. YOU HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT HSPM SOLUTIONS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR SUBMITTED CONTENT OR THE DEFAMATORY, OFFENSIVE, OR ILLEGAL CONDUCT OF ANY THIRD PARTY OR SERVICE USER OR SERVICE PROVIDER AND THAT THE RISK OF HARM OR DAMAGE FROM THE FOREGOING RESTS ENTIRELY WITH YOU. YOU FURTHER ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT HSPM SOLUTIONS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES (INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF BUSINESS, REVENUE, PROFITS, USE, DATA OR OTHER ECONOMIC ADVANTAGE) WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM OR RELATING TO ANY CONTRACT BETWEEN WEBSITE/MOBILE APP USERS ENTERED INTO INDEPENDENTLY OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP. 

 61. THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP MAY CONTAIN LINKS TO THIRD-PARTY WEBSITE/MOBILE APPS THAT ARE NOT OWNED OR CONTROLLED BY HSPM SOLUTIONS. HSPM SOLUTIONS DOES NOT HAVE ANY CONTROL OVER, AND ASSUMES NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR, THE CONTENT, PRIVACY POLICIES, OR PRACTICES OF ANY THIRD-PARTY WEBSITE/MOBILE APPS. IN ADDITION, HSPM SOLUTIONS WILL NOT AND CANNOT CENSOR OR EDIT THE CONTENT OF ANY THIRD-PARTY SITE. BY USING THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP, YOU EXPRESSLY RELIEVE HSPM SOLUTIONS FROM ANY AND ALL LIABILITY ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF ANY THIRDPARTY WEBSITE/MOBILE APP. ACCORDINGLY, PLEASE BE ADVISED TO READ THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AND PRIVACY POLICY OF EACH THIRD-PARTY WEBSITE/MOBILE APP THAT YOU VISIT, INCLUDING THOSE DIRECTED BY THE LINKS CONTAINED ON THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP. 

 62. Neither HSPM Solutions nor you shall be liable to the other for any delay or failure in performance under these Terms of Use, other than payment obligations, arising out of a cause beyond its control and without its fault or negligence. Such causes may include, but are not limited to fires, floods, earthquakes, strikes, unavailability of necessary utilities, blackouts, acts of God, acts of declared or undeclared war, acts of regulatory agencies, or national disasters.

63. YOU AGREE TO DEFEND, INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS HSPM SOLUTIONS, AND ITS OFFICERS, MANAGERS, MEMBERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, SUCCESSORS, ASSIGNS, SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, SERVICE PROFESSIONALS, SUPPLIERS, AND AGENTS, FROM AND AGAINST ANY AND ALL CLAIMS, DAMAGES, OBLIGATIONS, LOSSES, LIABILITIES, COSTS OR DEBT, AND EXPENSES (INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ATTORNEYS' FEES) ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF, ACCESS TO, AND PARTICIPATION IN THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP; YOUR VIOLATION OF ANY PROVISION OF THESE TERMS OF USE, INCLUDING THE PRIVACY POLICY; YOUR VIOLATION OF ANY THIRD-PARTY RIGHT, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION ANY COPYRIGHT, PROPERTY, PROPRIETARY, INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY, OR PRIVACY RIGHT; OR ANY CLAIM THAT YOUR SUBMITTED CONTENT CAUSED DAMAGE TO A THIRD PARTY. THIS DEFENSE AND INDEMNIFICATION OBLIGATION WILL SURVIVE THESE TERMS OF SERVICE AND YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP. 

 64. IF YOU HAVE A DISPUTE WITH ONE OR MORE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP USERS, YOU FOREVER RELEASE HSPM SOLUTIONS (AND ITS OFFICERS, MANAGERS, MEMBERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, SUCCESSORS, ASSIGNS, SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, SERVICE PROFESSIONALS, SUPPLIERS, AGENTS, SUBSIDIARIES, AND EMPLOYEES) FROM ANY AND ALL CLAIMS, DEMANDS AND DAMAGES (ACTUAL AND CONSEQUENTIAL) OF EVERY KIND AND NATURE, KNOWN AND UNKNOWN, ARISING OUT OF OR IN ANY WAY CONNECTED WITH YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE/MOBILE APP AND/OR ANY SUBMITTED CONTENT. 

 65. THESE TERMS OF USE, AND ANY RIGHTS AND LICENSES GRANTED HEREUNDER, MAY NOT BE TRANSFERRED OR ASSIGNED BY YOU, BUT MAY BE ASSIGNED BY HSPM SOLUTIONS WITHOUT RESTRICTION. 



 66. You agree that, except as otherwise expressly provided in these Terms of Use, there shall be no third-party beneficiaries to these Terms of Use. 

 67. You agree that HSPM Solutions may provide you with notices, including those regarding changes to these Terms of Use, by email, regular mail, or postings on the Website/Mobile App. 

 68. These Terms of Use, together with any other legal notices or Additional Policies published by HSPM Solutions on the Website/Mobile App, shall constitute the entire agreement between you and HSPM Solutions concerning the Website/Mobile App. If any provision of these Terms of Use is deemed invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of these Terms of Use, which shall remain in full force and effect.

69. No waiver of any provision of this these Terms of Use shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or any other term, and HSPM Solutions's failure to assert any right or provision under these Terms of Use shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. 

 70. Access to the Website/Mobile App and use of the content offered on the Website/Mobile App is subject to this privacy policy. By accessing the Website/Mobile App and by continuing to use the content offered, you are deemed to have accepted this privacy policy, and in particular, you are deemed to have consented to HSPM Solutions’s use and disclosure of your personal information in the manner prescribed in this privacy policy. HSPM Solutions reserves the right to amend this privacy policy from time to time. If you disagree with any part of this privacy policy, you must immediately discontinue your access to the Website/Mobile App. As part of the normal operation of Website/Mobile App, HSPM Solutions collect, use and, in some cases, disclose information about you to third parties. Accordingly, HSPM Solutions has developed this privacy policy in order for you to understand how HSPM Solutions collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of your personal information when you use the Website/Mobile App: 
 a) Before or at the time of collecting personal information, HSPM Solutions will identify the purposes for which information is being collected. 
 b) HSPM Solutions will collect and use personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by it and for other compatible purposes, unless HSPM Solutions obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law. 
 c) HSPM Solutions will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfilment of those purposes. 
 d) HSPM Solutions will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned. 
 e) Personal information should be relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used, and, to the extent necessary for those purposes, should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date. 
 f) HSPM Solutions will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. 
 g) HSPM Solutions is committed to conducting business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained.
